reporter_caption.center: NIKOLAISEN v. SIMPSON TIMBER CO., 100 Wn. App. 1069 (2000)

caption.center: LANCE NIKOLAISEN, ET AL., Appellants v. SIMPSON TIMBER COMPANY

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 97-2-16929-1, Richard D. Eadie, J., entered November 13, 1998.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part and reversed in part by unpublished opinion per Cox, J., concurred in by Coleman and Webster, JJ.
